price: pé ní òní mẹ̀kúnnù kan kò gbọdọ̀ wọnú rẹ̀ wá ba yín.
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
